records.title: Mini Valet
details: Cleaning all windows inside and out.
Application of quick detailer / car body shine.

records.title: Full Valet
details: Cleaning all windows inside and out.
Hard wax car paint protection (protection for up to 6 months).

records.title: Full Valet +
details: Cleaning all windows inside and out.
Polymer coating protection for car paint (protection for up to 12 months).

records.title: Standard Washing
details: Thorough exterior washing, initial wheel and bug washing, drying the bodywork, tire shine, applying hydro wax.

records.title: Premium Washing
details: Thorough exterior washing (two-bucket method), cleaning door frames, cleaning wheels with iron remover, tire shine, drying the body, applying hydro wax.

records.title: Detailing Wash
details: Thorough exterior washing (two-bucket method) with brushing, cleaning door frames, cleaning wheels with iron remover, removing iron particles and tar from the body, tire shine, drying the body, applying liquid wax.

records.title: Quick Detailer
details: Quick improvement of the body gloss. Restores shine and depth of color.

records.title: Hard Wax Paint Protection up to 6 months
Polymer Coating
details: Protection for the bodywork with polymer coating for up to 12 months.

records.title: Ceramic Coating 3 Years
details: Correction and protection of the paint with Ulcoat One + Hydro HD coating.

records.title: Ceramic Coating 4 Years
details: Correction and protection of the paint with Aqua Graphene coating.

records.title: Ceramic Coating 5 Years
details: Correction and protection of the paint with Ultracoat Premium Bond 9h coating.

records.title: Removal of Stone Contamination from the Body and Windows
details: Restoration of smoothness and clarity of the paint and windows by removing stone contamination using safe methods.

records.title: Body Decalcification
details: Cleaning the paint from contaminants, restoring its smoothness and gloss.

records.title: Comprehensive Service (Unlocking) Ceramic Coating
details: Comprehensive maintenance of the ceramic coating, restoring its hydrophobic and protective properties.

records.title: Basic Upholstery Cleaning
details: Includes cleaning seats, rear seat, and door panels in a 5-seat car.

records.title: Floor Cleaning
details: Cleaning the floor without removing the seats.

records.title: Leather Upholstery Cleaning
details: Cleaning leather seats, door panels, steering wheel, headrests, and gear shift knob using special leather products and brush.
